rows.translation: And when it was said to them: "Live in this land and eat of its produce wheresoever you like, and ask for remission of your sins, but pass through the gates with submission (and not pride), We shall forgive your trespasses, and give to those who are righteous abundance,"
rows.transliteration: wa idh qīla lahumus skunū hādhihil qaryata wakulū minhā ḥaythu shi-tum waqūlū ḥiṭṭatun wadkhulul bāba sujjadan naghfir lakum khaṭī-ātikum ۚ sanazīdul muḥsinīn

rows.arabic: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ قَوْلًا غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى قِيلَ لَهُمْ فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِجْزًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
rows.translation: The wicked among them changed and perverted the word We had spoken to a word unpronounced; so We sent from heaven retribution on them for all their wickedness.
rows.transliteration: fabaddalal ladhīna ẓalamū minhum qawlan ghayral ladhī qīla lahum fa-arsalnā `alayhim rijzan minas samā-i bimā kānū yaẓlimūn

rows.arabic: وَسْـَٔلْهُمْ عَنِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَتْ حَاضِرَةَ ٱلْبَحْرِ إِذْ يَعْدُونَ فِى ٱلسَّبْتِ إِذْ تَأْتِيهِمْ حِيتَانُهُمْ يَوْمَ سَبْتِهِمْ شُرَّعًا وَيَوْمَ لَا يَسْبِتُونَ ۙ لَا تَأْتِيهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَبْلُوهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
rows.translation: Enquire of them about the town situated by the sea where, when they did not keep the Sabbath, the fish came up to the surface of the water for them; but on days other than the Sabbath the fish did not come. We tried them in this way, for they were disobedient.
rows.transliteration: was-alhum `anil qaryatil latī kānat ḥāḍiratal baḥri idh ya`dūna fis sabti idh ta-tīhim ḥītānuhum yawma sabtihim shurra`an wayawma lā yasbitūna lā ta-tīhim ۚ kadhālika nablūhum bimā kānū yafsuqūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَتْ أُمَّةٌ مِّنْهُمْ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوْمًا ۙ ٱللَّهُ مُهْلِكُهُمْ أَوْ مُعَذِّبُهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ قَالُوا۟ مَعْذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: When a Section of them said: "Why do you admonish a people whom God is about to destroy or to punish severely?" They replied: "To clear ourselves of blame before your Lord, and that they may fear God.
rows.transliteration: wa idh qālat ummatun minhum lima ta`iẓūna qawmanillāhu muhlikuhum aw mu`adhhibuhum `adhāban shadīdā ۖ qālū ma`dhiratan ilā rabbikum wala`allahum yattaqūn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلسُّوٓءِ وَأَخَذْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍۭ بَـِٔيسٍۭ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
rows.translation: But when they forgot to remember the warning, We saved those who prohibited evil, but inflicted on the wicked a dreadful punishment -- requital for their disobedience.
rows.transliteration: falammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihi anjaynal ladhīna yanhawna `anis sū-i wa-akhadhnal ladhīna ẓalamū bi`adhābin ba-īsin bimā kānū yafsuqūn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّا عَتَوْا۟ عَن مَّا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ قُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُونُوا۟ قِرَدَةً خَـٰسِـِٔينَ
rows.translation: When they persisted in doing what they had been forbidden, We said to them: "Become (like) apes despised."
rows.transliteration: falammā `ataw `an mā nuhū `anhu qulnā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsi-īn

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَبْعَثَنَّ عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ مَن يَسُومُهُمْ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
rows.translation: And your Lord declared He would send men against them who would inflict dreadful suffering on them till the Day of Doom, for your Lord is swift in retribution, though He is certainly forgiving and kind.
rows.transliteration: wa idh ta-adhhana rabbuka layab`athanna `alayhim ilā yawmil qiyāmati man yasūmuhum sū al `adhāb ۗ inna rabbaka lasarī`ul `iqāb ۖ wa innahu laghafūrun raḥīm

rows.arabic: وَقَطَّعْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أُمَمًا ۖ مِّنْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنْهُمْ دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَبَلَوْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ وَٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
rows.translation: We dispersed them in groups over the earth, some righteous, some otherwise; and We tried them with good things and bad, that they may haply turn back.
rows.transliteration: waqaṭṭa`nāhum fil-arḍi umamā ۖ minhumuṣ ṣāliḥūna wa minhum dūna dhālik ۖ wabalawnāhum bil ḥasanāti was sayyi-āti la`allahum yarji`ūn

rows.arabic: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ وَرِثُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَأْخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ وَيَقُولُونَ سَيُغْفَرُ لَنَا وَإِن يَأْتِهِمْ عَرَضٌ مِّثْلُهُۥ يَأْخُذُوهُ ۚ أَلَمْ يُؤْخَذْ عَلَيْهِم مِّيثَـٰقُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَن لَّا يَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ وَدَرَسُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ ۗ وَٱلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: Then after them a new generation inherited the Book. They took to the things of this base world, and said: "We shall (surely) be forgiven this." Yet they will accept similar things if they came their way again. Had they not been covenanted in the Book to say nothing in the name of God but the truth? And they have read this in it. The abode of the life to come is better for those who fear God. Can they not comprehend?
rows.transliteration: fakhalafa min ba`dihim khalfun warithul kitāba ya-khudhūna `araḍa hādhal-adnā wayaqūlūna sayughfaru lanā wa in ya-tihim `araḍun mithluhu ya-khudhūh ۚ alam yu-khadh `alayhim mīthāqul kitābi an lā yaqūlū `alallāhi illal-ḥaqqa wadarasū mā fīh ۗ wad dārul-ākhiratu khayrul lilladhīna yattaqūn ۗ afalā ta`qilūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ
rows.translation: As for those who adhere to the Book and are firm in devotion, We shall certainly not let the wages of those who are upright to go waste.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna yumassikūna bil kitābi wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta innā lā nuḍī`u ajral muṣliḥīn

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ نَتَقْنَا ٱلْجَبَلَ فَوْقَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٌ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ وَاقِعٌۢ بِهِمْ خُذُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكُم بِقُوَّةٍ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: The day We shook the mountain above them like an awning, and they feared it would fall over them, (We said): "Hold fast to what We have given you, and bear in mind what is (said) therein so that you may take heed."
rows.transliteration: wa idh nataqnal jabala fawqahum ka-annahu ẓullatun waẓannū annahu wāqi`un bihim khudhū mā ātaynākum biquwwatin wadhkurū mā fīhi la`allakum tattaqūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَأَشْهَدَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَلَسْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ ۛ شَهِدْنَآ ۛ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنْ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِينَ
rows.translation: When your Lord brings forth from their loins the offspring of the children of Adam, He makes them witnesses over themselves, (and asks): "Am I not your Lord?" 'Indeed,' they reply. 'We bear witness,' -- lest you should say on the Day of Resurrection: "We were not aware of this;"
rows.transliteration: wa idh akhadha rabbuka min banī ādama min ẓuhūrihim dhurriyyatahum wa-ash-hadahum `alā anfusihim alastu birabbikum ۖ qālū balā ۛ shahidnā ۛ an taqūlū yawmal qiyāmati innā kunnā `an hādhā ghāfilīn

rows.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَشْرَكَ ءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا ذُرِّيَّةً مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ أَفَتُهْلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
rows.translation: Or, lest they should say: "It were our fathers who had ascribed compeers to God; we are only their offspring. Will You destroy us for the deeds of those who dealt in vanities?"
rows.transliteration: aw taqūlū innamā ashraka ābā-unā min qablu wakunnā dhurriyyatan min ba`dihim ۖ afatuhlikunā bimā fa`alal-mubṭilūn

rows.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
rows.translation: That is how We explain Our signs distinctly so that they may come back (to the right path).
rows.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti wala`allahum yarji`ūn

rows.arabic: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنْهَا فَأَتْبَعَهُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
rows.translation: Relate to them the plight of the man whom We gave Our signs, but he passed them by, so that Satan came after him, and he went astray.
rows.transliteration: watlu `alayhim naba-al ladhī ātaynāhu āyātinā fansalakha minhā fa-atba`ahush shayṭānu fakāna minal ghāwyn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ بِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ ۚ فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ ٱلْكَلْبِ إِن تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْهِ يَلْهَثْ أَوْ تَتْرُكْهُ يَلْهَث ۚ ذَّٰلِكَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۚ فَٱقْصُصِ ٱلْقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
rows.translation: We wished to exalt him, but he loved baseness and followed his lust. His likeness is that of a dog who hangs out his tongue if you drive him away, and still hangs it out if you leave him alone. Such is the case of the people who deny Our signs. Narrate this history to them; they may haply reflect.
rows.transliteration: walaw shi-nā larafa`nāhu bihā walākinnahu akhlada ilal-arḍi wattaba`a hawāh ۚ famathaluhu kamathalil kalbi in taḥmil `alayhi yalhath aw tatruk-hu yalhath ۚ dhālika mathalul qawmil ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā ۚ faqṣuṣil qaṣaṣa la`allahum yatafakkarūn

rows.arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
rows.translation: Evil is the case of those who deny Our signs and wrong themselves.
rows.transliteration: sā-a mathalanil-qawmul ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūn

rows.arabic: مَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِى ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
rows.translation: He alone is guided whom God shows the way; and whom He leads astray is surely lost.
rows.transliteration: man yahdillāhu fahuwal muhtadī ۖ wa man yuḍlil fa-ulā-ika humul khāsirūn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ذَرَأْنَا لِجَهَنَّمَ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ ۖ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌ لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰفِلُونَ
rows.translation: Many of the jinns and human beings have We destined for Hell, who possess hearts but do not feel, have eyes but do not see, have ears but do not hear, like cattle, even worse than them. They are people unconcerned.
rows.transliteration: walaqad dhara-nā lijahannama kathīran minal jinni wal-ins ۖ lahum qulūbul lā yafqahūna bihā walahum a`yunul lā yubṣirūna bihā walahum ādhānul lā yasma`ūna bihā ۚ ulā-ika kal-an`āmi bal hum aḍall ۚ ulā-ika humul ghāfilūn

rows.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ فَٱدْعُوهُ بِهَا ۖ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلْحِدُونَ فِىٓ أَسْمَـٰٓئِهِۦ ۚ سَيُجْزَوْنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: All the names of God are beautiful, so call Him by them; and leave those alone who act profanely towards His names: They will be retributed for their deeds.
rows.transliteration: walillāhil-asmā-ul ḥusnā fad`ūhu bihā ۖ wadharul ladhīna yulḥidūna fī asmā-ih ۚ sayujzawna mā kānū ya`malūn

rows.arabic: وَمِمَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ أُمَّةٌ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ
rows.translation: Yet there are among those We have created people who lead (others) to the truth, and act justly in its light
rows.transliteration: wa mimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil ḥaqqi wabihi ya`dilūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: We shall punish those who deny Our revelations slowly in a way that they will not know.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā sanastadrijuhum min ḥaythu lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
rows.translation: I will just give them respite. My plan is certainly invincible.
rows.transliteration: wa-umlī lahum ۚ inna kaydī matīn

rows.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ ۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: Have they not bethought themselves their companion is not mad? He is only a plain admonisher.
rows.transliteration: awalam yatafakkarū ۗ mā biṣāḥibihim min jinnah ۚ in huwa illā nadhīrun mubīn

rows.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا۟ فِى مَلَكُوتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ وَأَنْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ قَدِ ٱقْتَرَبَ أَجَلُهُمْ ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Have they not contemplated the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything created by God, (to educe) that perhaps their own term is drawing to a close? In what lore after this would they then believe?
rows.transliteration: awalam yanẓurū fī malakūtis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā khalaqallāhu min shay-in wa-an `asā an yakūna qadiq-taraba ajaluhum ۖ fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin ba`dahu yu-minūn

rows.arabic: مَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِىَ لَهُۥ ۚ وَيَذَرُهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
rows.translation: Whosoever God allows to go astray has none to show him the way, for He leaves them to wander perplexed in their wickedness.
rows.transliteration: man yuḍlilillāhu falā hādiya lah ۚ wayadharuhum fī ṭughyānihim ya`mahūn

rows.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى ۖ لَا يُجَلِّيهَا لِوَقْتِهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ ثَقُلَتْ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا تَأْتِيكُمْ إِلَّا بَغْتَةً ۗ يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ كَأَنَّكَ حَفِىٌّ عَنْهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: They ask you about the Hour: "When is its determined time?" Say: "Only my Lord has the knowledge. No one can reveal it except He. Oppressive will it be for the heavens and the earth. When it comes, it will come unawares." They ask you about it as if you were in the know. You tell them: "Only God has the knowledge." But most people do not know.
rows.transliteration: yas-alūnaka `anis sā`ati ayyāna mursāhā ۖ qul innamā `il-muhā `inda rabbī ۖ lā yujallīhā liwaqtihā illā huw ۚ thaqulat fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ lā ta-tīkum illā baghtah ۗ yas-alūnaka ka-annaka ḥafiyyun `anhā ۖ qul innamā `il-muhā `indallāhi walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: قُل لَّآ أَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِى نَفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْ كُنتُ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ لَٱسْتَكْثَرْتُ مِنَ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِىَ ٱلسُّوٓءُ ۚ إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ وَبَشِيرٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Tell them: "I am not master of my own gain or loss but as God may please. If I had the knowledge of the Unknown I would have enjoyed abundance of the good, and no evil would have touched me. I am only a bearer of warnings and bringer of happy news for those who believe."
rows.transliteration: qul lā amliku linafsī naf`an walā ḍarran illā mā shā-allāh ۚ walaw kuntu a`lamul ghayba lastakthartu minal khayri wa mā massaniyas sū-u ۚ in ana illā nadhīrun wabashīrul liqawmiy yu-minūn

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ وَجَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا لِيَسْكُنَ إِلَيْهَا ۖ فَلَمَّا تَغَشَّىٰهَا حَمَلَتْ حَمْلًا خَفِيفًا فَمَرَّتْ بِهِۦ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَثْقَلَت دَّعَوَا ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُمَا لَئِنْ ءَاتَيْتَنَا صَـٰلِحًا لَّنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
rows.translation: It is He who created you from a single cell, and from it created its mate, that you may live as companions. When the man covered the woman she conceived a light burden and carried it about. And when she was heavy (with child) they prayed together to their Lord: "If You bestow a healthy son on us we shall truly be grateful."
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī khalaqakum min nafsin wāḥidatin waja`ala minhā zawjahā liyaskuna ilayhā ۖ falammā taghashhāhā ḥamalat ḥamlan khafīfan famarrat bih ۖ falammā athqalat da`awallāha rabbahumā la-in ātaytanā ṣāliḥal lanakūnanna minash shākirīn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَـٰلِحًا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا ۚ فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
rows.translation: But when they were given a healthy son, they started ascribing to other powers a share in what God had bestowed on them. But God is above what they ascribe to Him.
rows.transliteration: falammā ātāhumā ṣāliḥan ja`alā lahu shurakā-a fīmā ātāhumā ۚ fata`ālallāhu `ammā yushrikūn

rows.arabic: أَيُشْرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخْلُقُ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ
rows.translation: Do they associate those with Him who cannot create a thing, and are themselves created,
rows.transliteration: ayushrikūna mā lā yakhluqu shay-an wahum yukhlaqūn

rows.arabic: وَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمْ نَصْرًا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
rows.translation: Who can neither help them, nor help themselves?
rows.transliteration: walā yastaṭī`ūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūn

rows.arabic: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَتَّبِعُوكُمْ ۚ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ أَدَعَوْتُمُوهُمْ أَمْ أَنتُمْ صَـٰمِتُونَ
rows.translation: If you call them to guidance they will not follow you. It is all the same if you call them or hold your tongue.
rows.transliteration: wa in tad`ūhum ilal-hudā lā yattabi`ūkum ۚ sawā-un `alaykum ada`awtumūhum am antum ṣāmitūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ عِبَادٌ أَمْثَالُكُمْ ۖ فَٱدْعُوهُمْ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: Those whom you invoke besides God are created beings like you. So call on them and let them answer your call, if what you say is true.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnillāhi `ibādun amthālukum ۖ fad`ūhum falyastajībū lakum in kuntum ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: أَلَهُمْ أَرْجُلٌ يَمْشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَيْدٍ يَبْطِشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌ يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَا ۗ قُلِ ٱدْعُوا۟ شُرَكَآءَكُمْ ثُمَّ كِيدُونِ فَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
rows.translation: Do they have feet to walk on, or hands to hold with, or eyes to see and ears to hear with? Say to them: "Call your compeers, and work out a plot against me, and do not give me time.
rows.transliteration: alahum arjulun yamshūna bihā ۖ am lahum aydiy yabṭishūna bihā ۖ am lahum a`yunun yubṣirūna bihā ۖ am lahum ādhānun yasma`ūna bihā ۗ qulid-`ū shurakā-akum thumma kīdūni falā tunẓirūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧىَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
rows.translation: My saviour is God who has revealed this Book; and He protects those who are upright;
rows.transliteration: inna waliyyiyallāhul ladhī nazzalal-kitāb ۖ wahuwa yatawallaṣ ṣāliḥīn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَكُمْ وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
rows.translation: While those you beseech apart from Him cannot help you or even help themselves.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnihi lā yastaṭī`ūna naṣrakum walā anfusahum yanṣurūn

rows.arabic: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَسْمَعُوا۟ ۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear. When you think they are looking at you, (in fact) they cannot see."
rows.transliteration: wa in tad`ūhum ilal-hudā lā yasma`ū ۖ watarāhum yanẓurūna ilayka wahum lā yubṣirūn

rows.arabic: خُذِ ٱلْعَفْوَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْعُرْفِ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
rows.translation: Cultivate tolerance, enjoin justice, and avoid the fools.
rows.transliteration: khudhil `afwa wa-mur bil `urfi wa-a`riḍ `anil jāhilīn

rows.arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ نَزْغٌ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: If you are instigated by the Devil to evil seek refuge in God, for God hears all and knows everything.
rows.transliteration: wa immā yanzaghannaka minash shayṭāni nazghun fasta`idh billāh ۚ innahu samī`un `alīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ إِذَا مَسَّهُمْ طَـٰٓئِفٌ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ تَذَكَّرُوا۟ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: Verily those who fear God think of Him when assailed by the instigations of Satan, and lo! they begin to understand,
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīnat-taqaw idhā massahum ṭā-ifun minash shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mubṣirūn

rows.arabic: وَإِخْوَٰنُهُمْ يَمُدُّونَهُمْ فِى ٱلْغَىِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: Even though their (devilish) brothers would like them to continue in error, and would not desist.
rows.transliteration: wa ikhwānuhum yamuddūnahum fil ghayyi thumma lā yuqṣirūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا لَمْ تَأْتِهِم بِـَٔايَةٍ قَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا ٱجْتَبَيْتَهَا ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَتَّبِعُ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ مِن رَّبِّى ۚ هَـٰذَا بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: And when you do not bring a (Qur'anic) verse to them, they say: "Why don't you make one up?" Say: "I follow only what my Lord reveals to me." These (revelations) are an evident proof from your Lord, and a guidance and grace for those who believe.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā lam ta-tihim bi-āyatin qālū lawlaj-tabaytahā ۚ qul innamā attabi`u mā yūḥā ilayya min rabbī ۚ hādhā baṣā-iru min rabbikum wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmiy yu-minūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُوا۟ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
rows.translation: When the Qur'an is recited listen to it in silence. You may perhaps be blessed.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā quri-al qur-ānu fastami`ū lahu wa-anṣitū la`allakum turḥamūn

rows.arabic: وَٱذْكُر رَّبَّكَ فِى نَفْسِكَ تَضَرُّعًا وَخِيفَةً وَدُونَ ٱلْجَهْرِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ بِٱلْغُدُوِّ وَٱلْـَٔاصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ
rows.translation: Meditate on your Lord inwardly with humility and trepidation, reciting His Book softly, morning and evening, and be not negligent.
rows.transliteration: wadhkur rabbaka fī nafsika taḍarru`an wakhīfatan wadūnal jahri minal qawli bil ghuduwwi wal-āṣāli walā takun minal ghāfilīn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
rows.translation: Verily those who are in the presence of your Lord are never too proud to worship and celebrate His praises, and bow in homage to Him'.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna `inda rabbika lā yastakbirūna `an `ibādatihi wayusabbiḥūnahu walahu yasjudūn ۩
